title: Creativity and Innovation Management
overview: The history of humanity is a history of innovation and creativity. Especially in the 4th Industrial Revolution, innovation and creativity have become the center of the economy. The development of all entities: from individuals, businesses to countries and the world is determined by the development of new products, new technologies, new organizational structures, and new cultural forms.

skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will be able to analyze and evaluate innovation activities at micro and macro levels.
Students will be able to use methods to encourage and motivate creativity in individuals and create an innovation culture in organizations.
